ygData.subject: Re: Magician pet heal spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: I know heals work on my Shaman s pet . .. many people have healed my pet in parties . . .  but he IS a wolf . .. ... From: Dark To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I know heals work on my Shaman's pet . ..

many people have healed my pet in parties . . . but he IS a wolf . ..

----- Original Message -----
From: Dark
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, January 17, 2000 6:45 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Magician pet heal spells?


From: "Dark" <jackal@...>

Heh well regular heal spells work on our pet. So it's quite fair. I don't
think heals work on magi pets anyway.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... <Aazen1@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, January 17, 2000 4:02 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Magician pet heal spells?


>From: Aazen1@...
>
>If you haven't already, go take a look over at the EQCasters site. They
have
>said that they are going to be adding 2 pet heal spells?! Correct me if I'm
>mistaken, but I thought that we got pet heal spells because regular
peoples'
>heals would not work on OUR pets, but they would on Mages. I guess its
>true-Anyone besides Necromancer(lol), who whines long enough, gets what
they
>want.
